name: Ben's zombie apocalypse au
description:
This is my first game so it will be a bit weird. I hope you enjoy it lol. There might be some typos which I havent noticed so please tell me if you find any.

The people here are all in the au. Some people probably havent showed up in the game yet. Some people didnt want to be in the game so I didnt include them here or in the game.

Credits (the credits will be in every chapter end too)
